result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dongon M Scott

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Dongon M Scott in court, in custody, with Attorney Nicole M Masnica.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  This case is dismissed and read-in for Defendant's plea to Case #13CM2173.

Defendant Dongon M Scott in court, in custody, with Attorney Nicole M Masnica.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern Becky Van Dam appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Masnica requests an adjournment as she is trying to get a global offer and speak with charging district attorney.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant is not to have any violent contact with victim/witness listed in the criminal compliant.  Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.

ADDRESS INFO for Dongon M Scott
Current: 3035 N. 55th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53210   (Effective: 03-18-2015)
Prior: Lka: 3901 N 60th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216

Defendant Dongon M Scott in court, in custody, with attorney J Anthony Rosario.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for April 10, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
